channel.title: Coding on Learn. Create. Ship.
channel.description: Recent content in Coding on Learn. Create. Ship.

item.title: How to Get a Job as a Programmer
item.description: Hi so now I will tell you how to be a programmer in the Philippines. This is the article I wish I had when I applied to my first programming job 4 years ago. This is how a normal interview process goes: You send a resume to the HR person of the company. They’ll check your resume and if it makes sense, they’ll ask you to come in for an interview.
